title: Canaveral National Seashore: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park       Here are just a few important ways you can help support Canaveral National Seashore:  While visiting, please follow the park guidelines outlined on the blue card you receive at the entrance station.    Bookstore - Our bookstore, located in the visitor center at Apollo Beach, offers many exciting and informative souvenir items which will enhance your experience and provide a tangible record of your visit. Because the park receives a percentage of the profits from the sales of these items, your patronage is an excellent way to support our efforts.  Volunteer - Of course, there's no better way to help out than to pitch in. For more information on the volunteer program, please contact Ranger Avia Woulard.       Volunteers-In-Parks brochure  (6.55mb)  Are you interested in making a donation to Canaveral National Seashore? (learn more)
